DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety AMG 403 healthy adult subject . The study consist 21 day screen period follow administration investigational product 154 day evaluation period .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Examine Safety , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics AMG 403 Healthy Subject
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman nonchild bear potential , Between age 18 55 inclusive , Body mass index 18 33 kg/m2 , Skin type compatible study assessment , without significant skin allergy , pigmentary disorder , tattoo , active dermatologic condition might interfere study conduct . Prior current history peripheral neuropathy , paraesthesia , dysesthesias , herpes zoster , postherpetic neuralgia , Evidence current illness common cold , viral syndrome , flulike symptom , disturbance autonomic nervous system , History Raynaud 's phenomenon ; Know allergy intolerance capsaicin hot pepper .
